snippet: Iran has finished installing equipment at an underground site where it is producing nuclear fuel that could quickly be converted to use in a nuclear weapon, international inspectors reported on Friday.
abstract: International inspectors say Iran has finished installing critical equipment at deep underground site where it is producing nuclear fuel that could quickly be converted to use in nuclear weapon.

byline.contributor: William J. Broad contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Iran has finished installing equipment at an underground site where it is producing nuclear fuel that could quickly be converted to use in a nuclear weapon, international inspectors reported on Friday.

headline.seo: Iran’s Fordo Nuclear Complex Reaches Capacity
headline.main: Iran’s Fordo Nuclear Complex Reaches Capacity
headline.print_headline: Iran Complex Is Said to Reach Capacity
